successes.title: Hidden Radio & BlueTooth Speaker
successes.description: The simplest, most powerful radio and wireless speaker for iPhone + iPad ever in a compact form. Lift the cap, the louder it gets!

Pledges.description: You're awesome, really! Every dollar helps get us closer! You'll get a Hidden Radio micro fiber MP3 pouch and cleaning cloth. We’ll also send you an invite to our San Francisco or Milan Launch party + you’ll be listed on our website as a contributor.

EARLY BIRDS Help us get the ball rolling! We will only be offering 199 Hidden Radios + BT Speakers in metallic silver at this discounted price. Be the first to get crystal clear sound in your home for only $99. At this discounted rate we just ask that you help us get the word out! 
FREE global shipping included.

ON BOARD You’ll be one of the first to get the HiddenRadio + BT Speaker in metallic silver. This will normally retail for over $175 but you will be able fill your room or apartment with booming sound at a discounted price. 
FREE global shipping included.

THE PAIR You’ll get two units in your choice of metallic silver or graphite black. One HiddenRadio will fill a room with booming pure sound, two can fill a home.
FREE global shipping included.

PARTY PACK you’ll get 5 units in your choice of color, including one individually numbered limited edition unit. ONLY for Kickstarter! With 5 units you can pass them to your friends or fill the house, patio, garage or wherever with great sound in a compact form! ONLY 100 units available!
FREE global shipping included.

PARTY PACK II If you missed the limited edition pack you can still get 5 units in your choice of color without the individually numbered version. This is a huge discount as they will regularly sell for $175 each! With 5 units you can pass them to your friends or fill the house, patio, garage or wherever with great sound in a compact form! FREE global shipping included.

SPECIAL EDITION WHITE you’ll be the first to receive 7 units in your choice of colors. Including a special high gloss white edition.
FREE global shipping included.
